data.title: Siebel Systems - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: Siebel Systems was a software company that specialized in customer relationship management (CRM) products, which Oracle Corporation acquired in 2006. This acquisition is an example of how businesses expand and consolidate their market position through mergers and acquisitions.
data.text:
Definition

Siebel Systems was a software company that specialized in customer relationship management (CRM) products, which Oracle Corporation acquired in 2006. This acquisition is an example of how businesses expand and consolidate their market position through mergers and acquisitions.
